CatDescriptText: Cutline of images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 17, 1941, reads: "Louis Drills For Baer By Playing With Big Sparmate; Clicks Over Airways - Here's Heavyweight Champion Joe Louis nonchalantly skipping rope at his training near Washington where he is training for his fight with Buddy Baer May 23. in center the champ is playing medicine ball with a sparmate with his bare hands.  At the right he is shown giving a good broadcast over Station WINX. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Boxer Joe Louis in striped robe and towel talking to two men at WINX microphone on stage with painted eagle on back wall, in hall with audience in foreground
